src_original: kenāyaṃ nivṛto lokaḥ kenāyaṃ na prakāśate /
tgt_original: 誰能覆世間　　誰能令不顯

src_original: kiṃ cābhilepanaṃ brūṣe kiṃ ca tasya mahad bhayam // Śag_39.1
tgt_original: 誰復能塗染　　誰為大怖畏
無明覆世間　　放逸令不顯

src_original: jalpābhilepanaṃ brūmi duḥkhaṃ tasya mahad bhayaṃ // Śag_39.2
tgt_original: 戲論能塗染　　苦為大怖畏

src_original: sravanti sarvataḥ srotāḥ srotasāṃ kiṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 諸流處處漏　　是漏誰能止

src_original: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi kena srotaḥ pidhīyate // Śag_39.3
tgt_original: 當說誰防護　　眾流誰所偃

src_original: yāni srotāṃsi lokasya smṛtiḥ teṣāṃ nivāraṇaṃ /
tgt_original: 世間諸流漏　　是漏念能止

src_original: srotasāṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi prajñayā hi pidhīyate // Śag_39.4
tgt_original: 我說能防護　　由慧故能偃

src_original: prajñāyāś ca smṛteś caiva nāmarūpasya sarvaśaḥ /
tgt_original: 念慧與名色　　今問是一切

src_original: ācakṣva pṛṣṭa etan me kutraitad uparudhyate // Śag_39.5
tgt_original: 何當永滅盡　　唯願為我說

src_original: prajñā caiva smṛtiś caiva nāmarūpaṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
tgt_original: 念慧與名色　　我說是一切

src_original: vijñānasya nirodhād dhi atraitad uparudhyate // Śag_39.6
tgt_original: 若諸識永滅　　於斯永滅盡
云何念所行　　諸識當永滅
